examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
The season starts in September.
She seasoned the meat with herbs and spices before cooking.
Tomatoes are out of season now.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: a period of the year during which a particular style of clothes, hair, etc. is in trend
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian trong năm mà một phong cách cụ thể của quần áo, tóc, vv là xu hướng

examples: So what’s the future of space couture?
They also loved the irony of naming their casual T-shirt line "couture."
words.defineEn: the design and production of exclusive clothes for individuals by a fashion house
words.defineVi: thiết kế và sản xuất quần áo độc quyền cho các cá nhân bởi một nhà thời trang

examples: Our graphic designer really carved out a niche for himself with that series of innovative ads.
The audience at the fashion show feasted their eyes on the stunning runway models, showcasing the latest designer collections.
Eve borrows money to buy expensive designer clothes - champagne taste on a beer budget!
She feels a million bucks when she wears her favorite designer outfit and walks with confidence.
The fashion designer's latest collection was ridiculed by some critics, but the designer remained optimistic - after all, there is no such thing as bad publicity.
words.defineEn: a person who designs clothes as a job
words.defineVi: một người thiết kế quần áo như một công việc

examples: The fashion designer unrolled a bolt of colorful fabric to examine its pattern.
The fashion designer's bold new collection was ahead of the curve, featuring styles and colors that were completely unexpected and ahead of their time.
The fashion designer's latest collection was ridiculed by some critics, but the designer remained optimistic - after all, there is no such thing as bad publicity.
The fashion designer is currently enjoying her salad days, receiving prestigious awards and recognition for her unique and innovative designs.
One of them was with the famous fashion designer, Betsy Johnson.
words.defineEn: a person who designs stylish clothes
words.defineVi: một người thiết kế quần áo thời trang

examples: Really, it was a fashion statement.
As a fashion statement, I would never buy that coat.
After that, heels for men, became a fashion statement linked to virility and high class.
These already look like the fashion statement of the millennium - one that the next generation of space explorers will wear to nearby asteroids, Mars, and points beyond.
Starting in the 1980s, glasses slowly transformed from a necessary medical device to a fashion statement for the face.
words.defineEn: something unusual or new owned or worn to attract attention to oneself
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó bất thường hoặc mới được sở hữu hoặc mặc để thu hút sự chú ý đến bản thân

words.defineEn: someone who always follows the latest fashion trends whether it suits them or not
words.defineVi: một người luôn theo xu hướng thời trang mới nhất cho dù nó có phù hợp với họ hay không

examples: Most people don't know this, but I'm a pretty fashion-conscious guy.
words.defineEn: aware of the latest fashion trends and tending to dress accordingly
words.defineVi: nhận thức được các xu hướng thời trang mới nhất và có xu hướng ăn mặc phù hợp

examples: The fashionable boots added a trendy touch to her outfit.

words.defineEn: following the latest or the most popular styles and trends in a specific period
words.defineVi: theo phong cách và xu hướng mới nhất hoặc phổ biến nhất trong một thời kỳ cụ thể

words.defineEn: the business or the products of making highly fashionable and expensive clothing
words.defineVi: doanh nghiệp hoặc các sản phẩm làm quần áo thời trang cao cấp và đắt tiền

examples: By the mid-1920s, pulp magazines and novels are en vogue.
As Langston Hughes wrote about this time: "The negro was in vogue."
Historically, some pretty dangerous clothing, cosmetics, and accessories have come in vogue, endangering their wearers and makers alike.
At around the turn of the 20th century, there was a vogue for African-American musicals, which we discussed in our episode on the theater of the Harlem Renaissance.
Formula was in vogue, and families of higher socioeconomic status were more likely to adopt these new feeding methods.
words.defineEn: the latest fashion trend or style of the time
words.defineVi: xu hướng thời trang mới nhất hoặc phong cách của thời gian

examples: The police closed in.
The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
His partner left the table in a fit of pique.
In 2018 the party had 10 000 members.
The birds built their nest in the tree.
words.defineEn: very fashionable at a specific time
words.defineVi: rất thời trang tại một thời điểm cụ thể

examples: All the sudden, it made the Hummer look very unfashionable because he was a vehicle that got maybe 10 miles a gallon when gas prices were shooting up to near about $4 a gallon across the country.

words.defineVi: không thời trang hoặc phổ biến tại thời điểm này; lỗi thời

examples: But day-to-day, second-by-second, its most important role is serving as a kind of catwalk for your motor proteins.

I feel a strong pain in my back when I stand in heels and now that i've just done the catwalk the pain is really bad again From today i have become your mentor Only some will stay with me until the finals So, good evening dear friends and welcome to the finals of Siberia's Top Model!
words.defineEn: a runway or passage that models walk on in front of the audience during a fashion show
words.defineVi: đường băng hoặc lối đi mà người mẫu đi trước khán giả trong buổi trình diễn thời trang

These books belong in the library's rare collection.
The museum curator collects antique artworks for the museum's collection.
I have thirteen stamps in my collection.
words.defineEn: a series of new clothes designed by a fashion house for sale
words.defineVi: một loạt quần áo mới được thiết kế bởi một nhà thời trang để bán

words.defineVi: mặc quần áo để trưng bày đặc biệt là một nghề

words.defineEn: a fashion designer who specializes in creating high-end, custom-made clothing
words.defineVi: một nhà thiết kế thời trang chuyên tạo ra quần áo cao cấp, đặt làm riêng

words.defineEn: (of clothes) ready-made and provided in all sizes rather than suiting only a particular customer

words.defineVi: quần áo làm cho thị trường chung không chỉ cho một cá nhân

examples: So, what I have always advocated for was a tailored bill that helps the unemployed, helps taxpaying families, helps our small business community, the restaurants.

words.defineEn: (of clothes) well-cut and fitted
words.defineVi: (về quần áo) được cắt và vừa vặn

words.defineEn: (of clothing) made with care and style by a tailor for a particular customer
words.defineVi: (quần áo) được thợ may làm cẩn thận và có phong cách riêng cho một khách hàng cụ thể

words.defineVi: quần áo tùy chỉnh

words.defineVi: một sự kiện nơi các nhà thiết kế thời trang giới thiệu những thiết kế mới nhất của họ trên những người mẫu bước trên đường băng tới khán giả

words.defineVi: nghề mặc quần áo hoặc phụ kiện để giới thiệu chúng với một nhóm người

examples: The suit he wore was tailored to fit him perfectly.
Daniel had dressed up to the nines at the wedding, looking dashing in his tailored suit and polished shoes.
While our designs are tailored to specific needs, our styling fee suits all pockets alike.
As a master tailor, he knew that the eye of the master will do more work than both his hands and could create a perfectly fitted garment with minimal waste of fabric.
The coach understood that each athlete had different strengths and weaknesses, and tailored training programs accordingly - a carrion kite will never be a good hawk.
words.defineEn: to customize or modify something, especially clothing, to fit an individual's specific measurements and preferences
words.defineVi: để tùy chỉnh hoặc sửa đổi một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là quần áo, để phù hợp với các phép đo và sở thích cụ thể của một cá nhân
